title.rendered: TTE Team invited to Danfoss’ ic7 event

content.rendered: TTE Products & Solutions was invited to be a part of a two-day iC7 Awareness event, organized by Danfoss. The initial day was facilitated by Thorsten Gehler, Product Marketing Manager from Germany, and Jai Masand, Sales Director- Industry Business Unit, who expertly guided attendees through the intricacies of iC7 delving into the features, values, and providing a practical, hands-on experience. The second day included workshops and interactive discussions for the exchange of ideas and insights.
